// Random Hydra code generated by HCG: https://github.com/alecominotti/hydracodegenerator
// @alecominotti

shape(3.0, 0.49, 3.327)
  .invert(0.5)
  .rotate(4.6, 4.0)
  .diff(solid(0.7, 0.0, 0.4, 0.5))
  .modulateRepeat(shape(3.0, 0.13, 3.0), 4.6, 3.44, () => Math.sin(time * 0.8))
  .repeatX(3.0, 1.0)
  .invert(0.7)
  .add(voronoi(0.0, 0.0, 0.6), 0.4)
  .modulateRotate(o0, 2.0, 4.39, 4.0)
  .add(gradient(3.0), 0.9)
  .repeatX(3.1, 4.91)
.out(o0)
